verses.verse: A Song of Ascents; of David. Behold, how good <S%H2896><s%> and how pleasant <S%H5273><s%> it is For brethren <S%H251><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in unity <S%H3162><s%>!

It is like the precious <S%H2896><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%>, That ran down <S%H3381><s%> upon the beard <S%H2206><s%>, Even Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s beard <S%H2206><s%>; That came down <S%H3381><s%> upon the skirt <S%H6310><s%> of his garments <S%H4060><s%>;

Like the dew <S%H2919><s%> of Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, That cometh down <S%H3381><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: For there Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%>, Even life <S%H2416><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
